analysis: The documents all pertain to labor disputes between companies (railways, airlines, and a manufacturing company) and their employees, represented by various labor organizations. The disputes have not been resolved through standard procedures and are deemed to threaten interstate commerce or national safety. As a result, a board of inquiry or emergency board is created by the President to investigate the dispute and report findings, with a temporary freeze on changes to the conditions that led to the dispute.
title: Presidential Intervention in Labor Disputes
